definitions: the removal of unwanted magnetism from a television or monitor in order to correct color disturbance

examples.text: receivers now have a coil around the front rim of the picture tube for automatic degaussing

shortDefinitions: removal of unwanted magnetism from television or monitor in order to correct colour disturbance

definitions: the destruction of the data on a data storage device by removing its magnetism

examples.text: their on-site data destruction services include hard drive degaussing, wiping, and destruction

shortDefinitions: removal of magnetism from data storage device

definitions: the neutralization of the magnetic field of a ship by encircling it with a conductor carrying electric currents

examples.text: degaussing is used to reduce the magnetic signatures of ships to counter magnetic mines

shortDefinitions: neutralization of magnetic field of ship
